Text:
Thanks!

The real problem isn't actual leftists- they are a severe minority. It's the clueless idiots who are the problem... the droves of mindless sheep following whatever pop culture tells them to.

I agree somewhat Zero_BS, but i mean, that is what they were...environmentalist liberals...that is the far left. I wasn't saying all liberals or anything...just the crazy ones that were there. 

my point was more the double standard of our biased media anyways

I hear ya... that was a very quick generalization I made, there. I didn't mean for my comment to sound so final and closed-ended.

I think GB listeners are mostly on the same page. It's only common sense, after all... that's what makes this situation so damn frustrating. Feels like a bad dream. Ignorance is dangerous!

Thanks again for all the uploads, both of you.
Oh, I'm not criticizing you...I was just clarifying my opinion more.
Lol... conservatives are too damn polite.
